name: Fantasy Zoo (itch)
description:
This is Fantasy Zoo manager game early version, game is fully playable. It is largely inspired by early 2000s Zoo Tycoon game so if you are familiar with that it should be easy to understand.  There shouldn't be any major bugs but do report them here if you find any.

Playing game:

You need to put animals into walled enclosures or they will be considered escaped. Animal needs can be seen when clicked, environment is dependent of correct terrain, environmental objects such as trees and enclosure size.

Controls:

  • Q, E rotate camera or current object
  • WASD or mouse to move camera

Upcoming features:

  • More animals and more uniqueness into them.
  • More environments
  • Wall strength and animal escaping
  • Challanges

Credits:

Game done by me. Most 3D models and textures bought from online. Humanoid animations from Mixamo, others done by me. 

Music by Strobotone, licensed under: CC BY-ND  https://freemusicarchive.org/music/Strobotone/game-and-broadcast-music
